Title: Chu and Blossom
Writer: Charles Chu (screenplay), Ryan O'Nan (screenplay), Ryan O'Nan, Charles Chu
Actors: Annie Potts, Melanie Lynskey, Caitlin Stasey, Alan Cumming
Plot: Joon Chu, a Korean exchange student, suffering from the loss of his brother, finds himself marooned in small-town USA, where he is irrevocably swept up into the brave new world and bizarre ...
